Test Name: Chronic Inflammatory Demyelinating Polyradiculoneuropathy (CIDP)/Nodopathy Interpretation, Serum
Purpose: To detect and interpret serum antibodies associated with CIDP/Nodopathy, ensuring accurate and reliable diagnostic results.
Container: Not specified (serum obtained from clotted whole blood)
Equipment: Centrifuge; Automated Immunoassay Analyzer (ELISA reader); Pipettes and tips; Refrigerators/Freezers
